name: Elder Scrolls Light Master File
summary: An ESL file is a game data file for select Bethesda Softworks video games, such as Fallout 4, Skyrim Special Edition (SE), and The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim VR. It stores a "small mod" plugin that modifies an element in the game, such as re-texturing an object or altering weapons or armor stats. ESL files are primarily utilized to distribute mod content via the Creation Club digital marketplace.
